title: How Christianity Made you a Story and Gave You a Hero to Emulate
description:
This is some additional commentary from the LSOO Series on "Story Vs. Reality" that I used as a sermon illustration for my 1 Peter 2 and 3 sermon. Christianity deployed a vital democratic meaning making filter to humanity that is currently trying to be stripped off. This is exemplified in the recent LSOO series. I begin to address it here. Like always, these are rough draft thoughts as I'm trying to work through the ideas. Thanks for thinking out loud with me. 

LSOO Stories vs Reality The Fundamental Difference https://youtu.be/wuI-hEDhfCw
LSOO Stories vs Reality: You are not a hero https://youtu.be/wuI-hEDhfCw
Rough Draft Sermon https://youtu.be/B0jayT7VlpA
Rationality Rules Jordan Peterson Jesus Smuggling https://youtu.be/on0Lziov00Y
Mouthy Buddha Jordan Peterson Sam Harris https://youtu.be/iBSOTY1rTtg
Tom Holland Dominion https://amzn.to/2WFKptY
Joseph Campbell Hero with a Thousand Faces https://amzn.to/2zLwMka
Every Story is the Same https://youtu.be/LuD2Aa0zFiA
Click here to meetup with other channel viewers for conversation https://discord.gg/jdVk8XU 

If you want to schedule a one-on-one conversation check here. https://paulvanderklay.me/2019/08/06/converzations-with-pvk/

For the audio podcast mirror on Podbean http://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/

To listen to this on ITunes https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/paul-vanderklays-podcast/id1394314333 

If you need the RSS feed for your podcast player https://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/feed/ 

All Amazon links here are part of the Amazon Affiliate Program. Amazon pays me a small commission at no additional cost to you if you buy through one of the product links here. This is is one (free to you) way to support my videos.

To support this channel/podcast with Ethereum (ETH): 0xd3F649C3403a4789466c246F32430036DADf6c62

https://www.patreon.com/paulvanderklay

Also on Lbry: https://lbry.tv/@paulvanderklay

Join the Sacramento JBP Meetup https://www.meetup.com/Sacramento-Jordan-Peterson-Meetup/
